value.title: 3 ways to embed Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will look at three ways that you can embed Power BI into your website or application. value.title: Download and Deploy a K12 Power BI Solution for schools

value.title: Power BI Drill Through: 5 Different Alternatives That May be Better For You!
